summary: This mod reskins the leather part of the outfit to make it look like steel.
descriptionHtml: As much as I love the Full steel plate armor outfit in Skyim, there was always one part of the outfit that I bothered me.. the leatherish part of the outfit that hangs on front and back of the armor around the crotch area. So what I did was take the very same steel texture used for the rest of the outfit and put it over the leather part so it looks like a true full steel plate armor outfit!
author: TheWizard200
